summary.description:
Today, more moisture-laden rainfall (up 0.5 mm).

Compared to today, yesterday also had noticeable differences in cloud levels (up 170 m).

The past week and month had observable variation in cloud levels (up 888 m), rainfall (down 0.1 mm), and inside temperature (up 1.7°C) when compared to today.

cloud levels.description:
Today’s average cloud levels is 170.1m lower than yesterday, 13.1m lower than the past week, 888.1m lower than the past month.

Yesterday’s cloud levels showed a low of 745m and a peak of 3580m, averaging 1816.3m; the week and month recorded warmer averages.
cloud levels.summary: A high cloud base will mean mostly sunny conditions.

summary.summary: Inside; comfortable and pleasant temperatures. Outside; the temperature will feel nicely warm and pleasant. Also, air will feel comfortable and balanced. Light to moderate rain is forecast, a high cloud base will mean mostly sunny conditions, and bright sunshine will dominate the day. The weather may change rapidly and become worse.
